programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Liquid Courage
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E17 Fight Night
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Meth Rage
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Family First
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Overflowed
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E19 Sage Wiz-dumb
programme.desc: A woman arrested 45 times gives advice to recently released drug users. Two Australian brothers can’t understand why playing a game of “footie” in a hotel hallway would land them in jail. A drunken nightclub security guard wrecks his scooter.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E36 Landlord Attack
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Toilet Paper Love Song
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E24 Messy Mascara
programme.desc: Tempers flare up when two agitated inmates share a cell. An intoxicated woman gives officers a hard time in booking, and a hustler facing DUI charges wants to change his ways.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Tuxedo Man
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E32 Reefer Madness
programme.desc: A drug dealer's mean-spirited girlfriend lands herself in isolation. The police deal with an inebriated man accused of throwing rocks, and guards attempt to defuse a situation involving battling cellmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Joyriders
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for an open container of beer. In Salt Lake City, UT a woman is stunned as to how drug paraphernalia wound up on her person. In Las Vegas, NV a former bus driver relays sad details about his past. In Portland, OR a shoplifter receives some sage of wisdom from one of the officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E39 Occupied By Psoriasis
programme.desc: An intoxicated man claims to be connected to the occupy Wall Street movement. Officers struggle with a combative man, and a tearful candy thief is taken into custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E21 Sleep Walker
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 Angry Probation
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Pregnant Hooker
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 OJ
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Melee in the Cell
programme.desc: A brawl breaks out between inmates during a routine jail breakfast. An inmate alters their uniform in provocative and outlandish ways. Concerns abound as one-man issues violent threats at deputies.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Cell Fight Suicide
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Can’t Raise Bail
programme.desc: A vice unit interrogates several individuals accused of sex crimes. Suicidal threats provoke a high-stakes situation within cell walls. Unable to raise bail, a woman is incarcerated for several days.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E18 High Strung Celly
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Running Wild
programme.desc: A disorderly man shouts to the heavens and asks for divine intervention. Twin brothers are arrested after a fray with police. A man in women’s clothing is booked after harassing passengers on a bus.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Wedlock-Up
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E29 Footloose
programme.desc: A secret stash is uncovered during a search at a suspect's property. Two rowdy inmates don't quite hit it off when they invade each other's personal space, and a jaywalker experiences problems keeping his pants from falling down.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 No Good Deed
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Caught On Camera
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 Crushin
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Fake Seizure
programme.desc: A man in detention is paranoid about officers handling him inappropriately. A man in custody claims to have a seizure. A man is taken in to custody for stealing videogaming equipment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 Sweet as Pie
programme.desc: Two agitated inmates are put in restraints to cool down. A suspected burglar expresses concern over a milk allergy, and an inmate becomes upset about the care given to her belongings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Waffle Drinker
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Phone Banger
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Fragrant & Flagrant
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Screamer
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Jog your Memory
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why he's been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 International Police
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E35 Child of God
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Homeless Hospitality
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Pinkfong Children's Fairy Tales
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: A compilation of children's classic fairy tales.

programme.title: Reading Stories with Pinkfong
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pinkfong Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: Listen to bedtime stories that soothe your little ones. Have a good night.

programme.title: Bebefinn Bora's Rainbow Unicorn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bebefinn Bora's Rainbow Unicorn
programme.desc: Bora LOVES unicorn with rainbow colors! Let's talk together the uniqueness of unicorns over the rainbow

programme.title: Bebefinn Let's Have Fun Bubble Bath
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bebefinn Let's Have Fun Bubble Bath
programme.desc: Let's have a fun bath time together Wash, wash, wash your hair. Shampoo, shampoo. Rub, rub, rub your head. Use your fingers. Rinse away, squeaky clean. Look at my new hairstyle! Let's rub your hair clean

programme.title: Baby Shark the Dentist
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Oh no, it looks like you have a tooth injury, so you've come to the dentist! Dr. Baby Shark will take care of everything for you! Alright, let's start the treatment. Please open wide and say "Ahh"!

programme.title: Pinkfong Super Rescue Team
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: "We Are The Pinkfong's Super Rescue Team! We solve all the problems in the town! Meet Roger the Police Car, Ready the Fire Truck, Forrest the Ambulance, Cloudia the Helicopter. Vroom Vroom, I am the Fire Truck Ready, dreaming of becoming a super-fire car! You're watching ""Ready, the Fire Truck's Day"", an educational and interactive Super Rescue Team series prepared to you by Pinkfong!"

programme.title: Bebefinn Number Songs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bebefinn Number Songs
programme.desc: One, two, three.Four, five, six.Seven, eight, nine, ten. Numbers, numbers.La la la la la la la. Have fun counting numbers!

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs.

programme.title: Hide 'n Seek with Shark Family
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Hide'n Seek with Shark Family 5
programme.desc: Oh no~! Shark Family is missing! Baby Shark is off on a singing adventure to find them — but he needs your help! Come on, friends! Let’s sing along and help Baby Shark bring the family back!

programme.title: Mischievous Thief Baby Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Oh, do you know Thief Baby Shark? His name is Lucky chucky Chuck! Let's sing along with Cute Baby Shark and Mischievous Thief Chuck!

programme.title: Baby Shark in Summer Time
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Baby Shark in Summer Time
programme.desc: A sizzling hot summer! Enjoy a refreshing summer with Shark Family to the tune of cheerful Hawaiian songs that suit the season.

programme.title: Veo, Veo 3
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Veo, Veo 3
programme.desc: Need help? Pinkfong, Baby Shark, and Ninimo are here! They’re singing the fun “Veo Veo” song and solving every mystery! Let’s follow their clues and catch those sneaky thieves together!

programme.title: Super Solver SAMMY 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Episode1
programme.desc: There is always Sammy next to Pinkfong and friends, where incidents and accidents never cease. But... the solving process is a mess!? Well, anyway, the clumsy problem solver Sammy gets things done!

programme.title: Police Car Song and more
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch brave Police Car saving the day! You're watching "Police Car Rescue Team Special", a fun and exciting Police Car Songs & Story compilation presented by Pinkfong!

programme.title: Here We Dance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Cheerful dances to best kid’s songs will make you healthy. Work-out and stay healthy!

programme.title: Super Solver SAMMY 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Episode1
programme.desc: There is always Sammy next to Pinkfong and friends, where incidents and accidents never cease. But... the solving process is a mess!? Well, anyway, the clumsy problem solver Sammy gets things done!

programme.title: Love Is All Around the World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Love Is All Around the World
programme.desc: Let's go on a journey aboard the heart boat and the heart hot air balloon! Travel around the world with Baby Shark and say "I love you" in various languages.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Long Hot Summer!
programme.desc: All 80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!

programme.title: Jenny Powell: Around The World!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jenny Powell: Around The World!
programme.desc: From London's West End to the the Manhattan Skyline, via Belfast, Rio, Vienna, Bangkok, Japan, China & Egypt - this is Captain Jenny's wander around the world... in song titles!

programme.title: Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.desc: From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.

programme.title: Even More Cuddles on the Couch!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Even More Cuddles on the Couch!
programme.desc: 25 more cuddles, fresh out of the archive at NOW 80s. Featuring Chris De Burgh, Angry Anderson, Atlantic Starr & The Kids From Fame.

programme.title: Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.desc: From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1988
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW Yearbook 1988
programme.desc: Another top year, with rock, reggae, pop & power ballads rubbing shoulders with exciting new dance sounds from the US & Europe. Bruno Brookes has the story - month by month.

programme.title: In The Summertime!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 In The Summertime!
programme.desc: Feelgood sunshine hits from a colourful decade - the 1970s! Flares & mini-skirts at the ready?

programme.title: Total Legends! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Total Legends! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 5 decades on nobody can now dispute the legendary status of this lot! From Frank, Bob & Johnny in 1970 to Olivia, Debbie & Kate at the end of the decade.

programme.title: Easy Like Sunday Morning! Chill 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Easy Like Sunday Morning! Chill 50

programme.title: La Dame Blanche - Live at Moods
programme.desc: Represented by the Lyon-based label Jarring Effects, Yaïté Ramos Rodriguez, aka La Dame Blanche confirms the strength of today's Afro-Caribbean scene. We are immediately reminded of Guyanese artist Yann Solo and the group Àbájade, two musical projects whose syncretic visions of bass music and santeria are propelling Creole universes into a fertile third millennium... Captured at the Moods Club, Zurich, La Dame Blanche borrows influences from urban musical spaces that she deliberately mixes with her African roots.The result is perceptible right from the sprightly opening sequence in which digitized polyphonies intertwine hypnotically. Accompanied by a drummer and a beatmaker, the young...

programme.title: Chillin' with Qwest TV
programme.desc: Enjoy our chillin' playlist cooked with love and get your day off to a good start with Qwest TV!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Farmer's Market
programme.desc: Matt and the Team prepare BBQ Sunday Dinner with ingredients from the Farmers Market. Herbed Prime Rib, Grilled Pork Chops with Garlic and Herbs, Roasted Root Veggies with Mustard Glaze, and Yorkshire pudding will please friends and family alike!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Ethnic Market
programme.desc: Using internationally inspired recipes, Matt and the Road Grill team take us on a taste bud tour around the world with Stuffed Peppers, Bison Burgers with Oka Cheese, Tandoori Lamb Ribs and Tea Smoked Hoisin Duck.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Coed Charity Baseball Tournament
programme.desc: Matt and the Team cook up a mound of food for hungry athletes raising money for charity. No one went hungry with Beef Dip Sandwiches; Lemon Honey Garlic Baby Back Pork Ribs; and fresh Grilled Mahi-mahi with sweet Pineapple Tomatillo Salsa.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 Game Night Dinner
programme.desc: Rob and his buddies are game for something wild. Rob obliges with a 5-star menu that includes smoked quail, grilled venison chops, stacked sweet potatoes and grilled brussel sprouts.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 Dog Walkers Breakfast
programme.desc: Rob's backyard is going to the dogs thanks to his new canine friend, Freddy. He and his dog loving friends enjoy a grilled breakfast before the daily walk to the dog park. French toast, bacon, sausage potato hash browns and baked eggs in hams crisps have everyone panting and taking home doggie bags.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 Big Promotion BBQ
programme.desc: Rob's friend Rick just got his big job promotion and it time to cel-ah -brate! The food is executive class all the way, with grilled raspberry Cornish hens, roasted beefeater tomatoes, spicy ground beef skewers, eggplant & squash salad and grilled nectarines over ice cream.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 BBQ Just Because
programme.desc: It's Saturday and Rob invites some friends over for a swim, some laughs and some great food grilled on his new charcoal BBQ. Rob goes all out preparing pizza, nachos, grilled shrimp quesadillas and buffalo burgers. Why? Just because! You never really need a reason to fire up some good times.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Silent Auction Party
programme.desc: Going once, going twice, gone. Rob and his friends are donating their special keepsakes to a Silent Auction to raise money for charity. They head over to Robs for a quick and delicious pre-auction chowdown that includes lemon pepper Cornish Hens, sweet monkfish, chili lime shrimp and stuffed pork tenderloin.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Live Band Party
programme.desc: Rob likes to Rock and Roll all night and BBQ every Saturday. This time he rocks out with his buddy Jim's Band "Giver". While they belt out the tunes, Rob creates his own hits with grilled lamb chops, crispy potato skins, beef brisket and smoked Proscuitto wrapped shrimp.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Grilled, Roasted & Charred Chicken
programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Lamb Four Ways
programme.desc: There are limitless options with lamb on the grill! Host Spencer Watts offers some tips and tricks on how to prepare four different cuts of lamb.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Fowl Play
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Salt Rocks!
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Cocoa-Q
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? That's right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencer's Grilled Chicken Molé. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts' favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Mother's Day Celebration
programme.desc: Everyone should treat Mom to a special breakfast! Matt and his team treated a crowd on Mother's Day to a BBQed Brunch. They feasted on Stuffed Blueberry Mascarpone French Toast, a Veggie Frittata, Applewood Smoked Canadian Bacon, and Fresh Fruit Smoothies

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Buskers
programme.desc: The Buskers Festival is in town! The team hit the grill to do some BBQ entertaining. They cook up a feast for the crowd including a Roast of Pork with Concord Grape Sauce, Spicy Shrimp, and Beer Braised Sausage with Caramelized Onions

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Garage Sale
programme.desc: The Road Grill Team go to a neighbourhood Garage Sale, then treat everyone to everyday dishes with a twist. Matt and his team grill up some Grilled Porterhouse Steaks in a Homemade Steak Spice; Grilled Lemon Prosciutto Scallops; Planked Stuffed Potatoes and a Grilled Caesar Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 The Dog Show
programme.desc: Matt loves animals - including dogs. He goes to a Dog Show to give dog lovers a little taste of what the QB is cooking - Garlicky Grilled Artichokes; Bacon Wrapped Halibut With Lime Scallion Sauce Sauce; Slow Cooked Spareribs With Guava Glaze; and A Summer Wild Berry Crisp.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Three course Argentinian meal
programme.desc: Award-winning chef Natalia Machado from Argentina makes palm heart and shrimp salad, beef stew in a pumpkin, roasted pork spare ribs with a delicious marinade, and addictive dulce de leche ice cream.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Water Park
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Tapas Dinner
programme.desc: Ole! Rob serves up a Spanish Tapas BBQ that includes spicy lamb ribs, beef tenderloin, blackened scallops, proscuitto wrapped figs stuffed with blue cheese and gazpacho vodka in cucumber cups. The portions are small, but the taste is huge! And that's no bull.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Carnival Day BBQ
programme.desc: Rob likes clowning around, but he is the Ringmaster of his own Carnival Day BBQ. After a fun day at the fair, Rob keeps the party going with a fairground finger food like pizza burgers, homemade pogos, pork ribs and cool iced tea.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 Bike Ride BBQ
programme.desc: Rob and his friends are hitting the bike trails. After a long bike ride, Rob grills up a high protein meal of veal ribs, steelhead trout, southwestern black bean salad and pistachio and honey crusted lamb racks.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 Boozey BBQ
programme.desc: The liquor cabinet is getting too full so Rob is throwing a Boozy BBQ with the left over spirits from parties past. He pulls together a feast of tequila chicken breasts, white wine veal chops, martini and grilled tarragon mushrooms.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E23 Tennis Tournament
programme.desc: Rob's Tennis Tournament BBQ is a smash with lamb shanks, roasted garlic mashed potatoes and black bean mussels. His guests all agree when it comes to barbequing Rob has the best serve.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E24 Skateboard Dude Party
programme.desc: Rob rewards the community kids for their hard work on the new park skateboard ramp. He "Kick Flips" the grill with some maple mustard pork burgers, chicken smoked pizza and corn on the cob with chili butter.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Barbeque Classic: Ribs
programme.desc: Grill master Spencer Watts shows us four ways to barbeque a classic. Succulent, tender, mouth-watering ribs.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bananas for Barbeque
programme.desc: Barbecuing bananas, that's crazy. Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill the delicate, evERS-scrumptious fruit. Bananas.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Delicious Grilled Shellfish
programme.desc: Shellfish is delicate, tantalizing, and full of flavour, especially when it's grilled to perfection

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Saucy
programme.desc: Barbeque is all about sauces, rubs and marinades

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Salsa that will Dance on Your Tongue
programme.desc: Salsa means undeniable flavour! Lively host Spencer Watts plays with sweet, salty, and spicy in four amazing salsa recipes.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Soap Box Derby
programme.desc: Not only do the racers in the Soap Box Derby have a need for speed, they have a need for BBQ! Matt and the RG team cook up a feast to slow down any speedster. The menu: Smoked Shrimp B.L.T., Pineapple Basil Rotisserie Chicken, Grilled Sweet Potato Pops, and Summer Berry Pudding.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Day By the Water
programme.desc: Matt spends the day by the water; fishing, playing Frisbee, catching some rays. What goes with water and sun? BBQ!!! Matt & his team make a seafood buffet of Grilled Clams in the Shell with Serrano Ham, Smoked Lake Rainbow Trout, Grilled Lobster with Grapefruit Salsa, and Crab-Stuffed Avocados.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Wake and Skate
programme.desc: Matt and the team do some extreme grilling for the skateboarders at a local park. The crowd flips for Black Bean Mussels, Prosciutto Wrapped Chicken Breasts Stuffed with Goat Cheese, Smoked Tomato Bruschetta and Smoked Banana Sticks with Rum Butter Glaze.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Tennis Day
programme.desc: Matt and his team visit the tennis club and serve up some grilled eats for the club members. Smoked Salmon, Beef Tenderloin with Cherry Sauce, Asparagus with Citrus Butter with a Grand Slam Beet Salad are the perfect match after a long day on the courts

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Farmer's Market
programme.desc: Matt and the Team prepare BBQ Sunday Dinner with ingredients from the Farmers Market. Herbed Prime Rib, Grilled Pork Chops with Garlic and Herbs, Roasted Root Veggies with Mustard Glaze, and Yorkshire pudding will please friends and family alike!

programme.desc: Rob and his buddies are game for something wild. Rob obliges with a 5-star menu that includes smoked quail, grilled venison chops, stacked sweet potatoes and grilled brussel sprouts.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 Dog Walkers Breakfast
programme.desc: Rob's backyard is going to the dogs thanks to his new canine friend, Freddy. He and his dog loving friends enjoy a grilled breakfast before the daily walk to the dog park. French toast, bacon, sausage potato hash browns and baked eggs in hams crisps have everyone panting and taking home doggie bags.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 3 on 3 BBQ
programme.desc: Rob and the boys train for the big 3 on 3 b-ball tournament and feast on grilled tandoori chicken, salmon cakes, pork satay, grilled potato chips and a roasted red pepper salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 Just Another Pool Party
programme.desc: The sun is shining, the pool is full and the food is hot. While his friends frolic poolside, Rob grills up some rum and mint grilled chicken wings, grilled seafood Paella, two kinds of smoked pork and some smoked salmon and crab rolls.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 FishBoy's Birthday
programme.desc: Fishboy is having a birthday and Rob's keeping the party a secret. Rob prepares nothing but the best including cedar smoked artic char, lobster tails with champagne sauce, sweet potatoes in a cinnamon butter, and roasted artichokes with lemon-saffron mayo.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S05 : E17 Off to the Academy Party
programme.desc: Rob's friend is off to the Police Academy so he cooks him a bon voyage meal with grilled sausage stuffed cabbage, charcoal rotisserie chicken, smoked veal roast, broccoli salad and baked potatoes

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Beef-a-palooza
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Barbeque isn’t Just for Meat
programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Grilled, Roasted & Charred Chicken
programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Lamb Four Ways
programme.desc: There are limitless options with lamb on the grill! Host Spencer Watts offers some tips and tricks on how to prepare four different cuts of lamb.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Fowl Play
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Dim Yum!
programme.desc: Warm and talented Cantonese home cook Mary Tang kick starts this One World Kitchen 3 episode by show- casing traditional, evERS-popular dim-sum dishes. First up, juicy Pork-Filled Dumplings! Made with fresh watERS-chest- nuts, shiitake mushrooms and a blend of Asian sauces and spices, these sweet and salty bite-sized creations are to die for! To add to our desire, Mary fries up some savoury Chinese Daikon Radish Cakes in a piping hot wok. Next, a flavourful lotus leaf filled with sticky rice and a medley of salted duck eggs, Shaoxing wine, and dried shrimp is truly hard to resist! To finish off, Mary combines gorgeous Adzuki beans with rice flour and sesame seeds to create airy and full...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sautéed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork p'té pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Lebanese Culinary Favourites
programme.desc: What better way to start a meal than with dessert? Lebanese home cook Jasmin Ibrahim shows us how to make a gooey cheese pastry doused in sweet syrup called Knafeh. With a buttery golden-brown crust, oozy melted cheese and fragrant rose water, this decadent dessert will surely satisfy your sweet tooth. Next on the menu, a Lebanese classic - pita bread. You'll never buy it from the store again with this delightfully easy recipe! Jasmin then prepares a well-known Lebanese sandwich - you guessed it, Shawarma! Loaded with charred chicken, a popular Lebanese 7 spice mix, and yummy garlic sauce, this might be the best sandwich ever! Finally, Jasmin cooks up a batch of tasty Beirut Spicy Fish -...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E22 Popular Athens Recipes
programme.desc: Greek home cook Joanna Chery kicks off this episode of One World Kitchen by showcasing popular recipes from Athens. She begins by preparing Chicken Souvlaki with Tzatziki, a classic dish featuring succulent, beautifully charred chicken skewers and a refreshing cucumber yogurt garlic dipping sauce. Next, she fries up some deliciously flaky cod with an irresitble garlic-potato dip, a staple recipe for Greece's Independence Day. Another popular dish in the Greek culture is Lamb Fricassee. It includes crispy, browned lamb pieces, juicy beef stock and a lovely egg - so savoury! Don't forget, we need a perfect dessert to follow a rich and hearty lamb dish: fried dough balls. Joanna shows us her...

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Summer
programme.desc: Summertime is all about being outdoors and fun host Jessica McGovern whips up some sweet treats that are perfect for a summer pool party.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Spring
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern loves the flavours of fall so she bakes up some delicious treats using warm, autumn-inspired ingredients.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Fall
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern loves the flavours of fall so she bakes up some delicious treats using warm, autumn inspired ingredients.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Winter
programme.desc: What should you do in a wild winter blizzard? Bake! Host Jessica McGovern makes sweet winter treats like an extravagant Gingerbread Chalet.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Oil
programme.desc: Chef Spencer Watts makes salmon and prawns pop with flavor as he works with any seafood kitchen's must-have ingredient: delicious flavored oils.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Vinegar
programme.desc: Chef and seafood expert Spencer Watts shows how vinegar, a simple pantry staple, can bring out the flavours of walleye, lobster and crawfish.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Cocktails
programme.desc: Seafood lover and chef Spencer Watts brings the party to the kitchen and shows that cocktails aren't just for drinking, they're also an inspiration for cooking great seafood.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Cold
programme.desc: Cooking doesn't always have to bring the heat. Chef and fish lover Spencer Watts shows you how to prepare cold dishes with arctic char and shrimp.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Irresistible Pork Recipes
programme.desc: Cantonese cuisine often incorporates pork and host Mary Tang shows us three diverse ways to elevate this juicy protein. First, she chops up a sweet winter melon - saving the hollowed out shell to use as a bowl - with spicy shredded scallops and lean pork tenderloin. Then, she whips up a quick and easy pork stir-fry with crispy snow peas and delicious red peppers. Finally, Mary showcases a Cantonese take on barbeque pork. The secret? A mind-blowing marinade. With sugar and honey crusted pork butt, fermented bean curd and a mixture of deli- cious Asian sauces, this tangy dish is worthy of an extra batch. Don't forget, delicately steamed sweet buns take this dish up a notch - Mary offers a...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Vietnamese Street Food
programme.desc: There's nothing more authentic than street food - Vietnamese style! Host Lisa Nguyen shares her tips and tricks on tasty Lemongrass-infused Beef Wraps. A vast array of ingredients including peppery betel leaves, gorgeous greens and crunchy peanuts complement the tenderness of flavoursome, marinated ground beef. Lisa's next dish is an iconic Vietnamese street food - crispy Sizzling Crepes with juicy pork belly and earthy vegetables will definitely activate your taste buds. For dessert, Lisa whips up a batch of sweet coconut pudding using beautiful bananas and velvety coconut milk sprinkled with roasted sesame seeds for some crunch.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Stuffed
programme.desc: The Lebanese love their stuffed foods, and host Jasmin Ibrahim shows us just how to do it! To start, she eloquently crafts golden Spinach and Feta Turnovers. Then, she stuffs a delicious zucchini with tender beef, crunchy nuts, and soft basmati rice, and smothers it in a flavourful tomato sauce. Next up, Stuffed Lamb and Bulgur Balls - small torpedo shaped balls of juicy minced meat, light and nutty bulgur, and a medley of aromatic spices. Her final dish? A date-stuffed cookie called Maamoul. Normally made for special occasions, these sweet cookies burst with flavour.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Olives: The Most Useful Ingredient
programme.desc: Is there anything more Greek than olives? Host Joanna Chery shows us how versatile the olive really is by cooking up four diverse Greek dishes. To start, a rich, baked-to-perfection Olive Bread loaded with strong, slightly fruity black Kalamata olives. She then prepares a refreshing Greek Village Salad full of seasonal vegetables, creamy feta, and plump juicy olives tossed in extra virgin olive oil. And guess what? It pairs great with fried Olive Bread! Then, Joanna switches it up with wonderful green olives - the star in her delicious stuffing for Apricot and Feta-Stuffed Chicken Thighs. Finally, we're graced with a unique dessert - Saint Fanourios Cake. Joanna adds metaxa (Greek...

Spice is the secret, a pinch of spice can make a world of difference!

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Morocco + Thailand
programme.desc: Join CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne for a trip to Morocco and Thailand! First up, whole Red Snapper is rubbed with earthy Ras el Hanout spice, poached in argan oil, and served with char-grilled oranges. Thailand inspires the next plate; Chicken Thigh 'Lollipop', roasted and served with bamboo shoots, chilies, and sauced with peanut-coconut red curry. Next, these countries both love Spring Rolls... Morocco's version, Briouat, is stuffed with saffron couscous and fresh cheese and fried... from Thailand comes a salad roll with shrimp and mango, dipped in a fiery green Nam Jim. Stick around for the big dish - Saffron buttERS-basted beef Striploin, served with complex Apricot-Green...

programme.desc: Thai chef and cookbook author Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how to make Thai dishes that were inspired by other cultures, from steamed dumplings to biryani to Massaman curry and custard tarts.

programme.desc: It's all about the grill as Thai chef and cookbook author Pailin Changchitnant makes dish after dish to go on the BBQ, like grilled eggplant salad, steak with dipping sauce or in a salad, and fish in banana leaves.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E24 Hearty Greek Fare
programme.desc: Winters in Greece can get chilly, so fun host Joanna Chery warms us up with some hearty Greek dishes. First, she rolls up some tender Meatballs in a Lemon-Egg Sauce featuring a secret ingredient: rice (shh!). Then, she cooks a vegetarian stew that's packed with tasty artichokes, soft-boiled potatoes, and fragrant dill - great for a cool spring night. To finish, she makes a famous Greek dish called Moussaka. Traditionally eaten at Sunday dinner, this dish emulates the warmth of friends and family. Although it's a two part process - it's packed with layered vegetables, a hearty meat sauce and a creamy béchamel on top - it's so worth it!

programme.desc: Thai chef Pailin Chongchitnant explores the cuisine of Northern Thai city Chiang Mai with red chili pork dip, minced pork salad, Thai-style chicken noodle soup, and Burmese-style curry.

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Uncommon Curry
programme.desc: If mace, fenugreek, and cloves aren't at the front of your spice shelf yet, they will be by the end of this episode! Co-hosts Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim bring these spices to a trio of fabulous recipes! First, octopus gets a slow bath in mace-scented olive oil before picking up a smoky char on the grill. A refreshing Thai Mango Salad gets amped up with the big flavour of fenugreek. Lastly, lamb chops get treated to an aromatic marinade of clove-spiked basil and parsley pesto.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italy's Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bhutan Paro
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: XP Guide

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Hanoi, Vietnam
programme.desc: In Hanoi, Rohan relishes local delicacies like Pho and Bun Cha. After this, he visits historic sights, rides a Cyclo and enjoys a water puppet show.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: The Gypsies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Gypsies Maheshwar, India
programme.desc: On a road trip across central India, Krisann and Benafsha stumble upon Maheshwar, a town where the legacy of an 18th century queen comes alive.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bhutan Thimpu
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.desc: A jeep safari, a spa treatment next to a pool with playful hippos

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun HoChi Minh, Vietnam

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 ACTION: For Reals – Legendary Red Bull Moments
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes compete in a freethrow contest, soar through the sky in wingsuits and parachutes, wakeboard in Chile and race dirtbikes in barrel events. It’s all part of their typical day.

programme.title: BIKE: Don’t Look Down – Sky-High Stunts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 BIKE: Don’t Look Down – Sky-High Stunts
programme.desc: At 2,000ft and freezing temperatures, Kriss Kyle proves you can ride a BMX park in the sky. Watch how his daring idea becomes an amazing mix of engineering and BMX skill.

programme.title: LIVE: Crankworx Whistler Red Bull Joyride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 LIVE: Crankworx Whistler Red Bull Joyride
programme.desc: The 'crown jewel' of Crankworx is everyone's favourite slopestyle event: Red Bull Joyride. Riders perform their best tricks and stunts on a bespoke obstacle course in an intense contest.

programme.title: Inside Pro Surfing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Inside Pro Surfing
programme.desc: The 2025 Surf Abu Dhabi Pro is here! Go behind the scenes for a close look at the action, on the waves and beyond. Don’t miss this exciting stop on the Championship Tour!

programme.title: Red Bull Signature Series
programme.sub-title: S2019 : E09 ACTION: Red Bull Signature Series – Greatest Moments
programme.desc: Feel the energy and experience the rivalries, as top athletes come together at Nitro Rallycross. An epic series of events where FMX, BMX, skate, scooter and rallycross worlds meet.

programme.title: Red Bull Signature Series
programme.sub-title: S2020 : E01 Red Bull Signature Series
programme.desc: The Volcom Pipe Pro on Oahu’s North Shore brings 144 top surfers to battle on the legendary Banzai Pipeline. Watch the world’s best face off on the ultimate wave!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 ACTION: Red Bull Soapbox Race – Crazy Obstacle Courses
programme.desc: Johannesburg’s most creative teams push their limits as they race down winding, challenging courses on wacky homemade themed cars. Each team aims to outsmart and outpace the rest!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S11 : E02 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: The 2022 Red Bull Soapbox Race in Melbourne, Australia brings wild homemade racers, crashes, laughs, and fierce competition as teams race for the win in this high-speed, creative showdown.

programme.title: Sea to Sky Highlights: FIM Hard Enduro 2024
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Sea to Sky Highlights: FIM Hard Enduro 2024
programme.desc: Top Hard Enduro riders race for days from Sea to Sky, set in Turkey’s stunning Kemer region. It’s fast, tough and fun. Can they handle the climb from beach to mountain?

programme.title: 24MX Hixpania Hard Enduro Highlights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 24MX Hixpania Hard Enduro Highlights
programme.desc: Steep hills, sharp rocks and tough tests wait in Spain. Top riders race the final round for off-road glory. One last shot to win it all. The finish line is close!

programme.title: British GT 2025 | Round 5: Spa-Francorchamps
programme.desc: Watch the fifth round of the 2025 British GT Championship at Spa-Francorchamps.

programme.title: The Biggest Incidents Of Formula 1 Cheating | Part 1
programme.desc: When it comes to Formula 1 the desire to become the best driver or to build the best car often means pushing everything to the absolute limit. However, there have been some significant rule breaches as teams desperately seeking to win have gained an advantage by delving into the unsavoury world of cheating. Here’s part one of a look at the most memorable examples of cheats, exploits and rules breaches we’ve seen in Formula 1.

programme.title: 1989 24 Hours of Le Mans
programme.desc: Incredible footage brings you the full story of more than 3,200 miles of racing at the classic Circuit de la Sarthe as the Porsches, Jaguars and Mercedes-powere Suabers battled with each other.

programme.title: British GT 2025 | Round 5: Spa-Francorchamps
programme.desc: Watch the fifth round of the 2025 British GT Championship at Spa-Francorchamps.
